item.title: SOFTWARE PROJECT MANAGER (FINANCIAL DISTRICT, SAN FRANCISCO, CA)
item.description:
Brighterion is the leading provider of Fraud Prevention and Anti-money Laundering Solutions for the Financial, Insurance, Healthcare, Telecom, and E-commerce Industries.

Our Market Leading Products are used by the Largest Corporations and Governments in the World.

Brighterion has a strong business partnership with the largest financial institutions in the World.

For more information please visit http://www.brighterion.com/

We are looking to add an experienced and talented Software Program Manager to our Growing US Team (Based in San Francisco, Financial District, CA).

At the core of the position is delivery. The ideal candidate is a creative, demonstrated leader/manager with superior analytical abilities and has a thorough understanding of software processes (development, configuration, testing, and deployment).This opportunity requires excellent technical and communication skills. The candidate is not just a policy maker/spokesperson but drives to get technical things done.

REQUIRED SKILLS

 Minimum 5 years of relevant work experience in software related projects.
 2+ years experience in defining projects, collecting requirements, writing detailed functional and test specifications.
 Experience in Data Base: Oracle or Db2 or Sql or ..
 Experience in development C++ or Java or ...
 Experience in XML, Messaging Protocols, and Web Services.
 A bachelor's degree in Computer Science or +

We offer:
 A state of the art in the Security industry
 An excellent team of engineers and PhD (in the US AND EUROPE) to collaborate with.
 A relaxed and productive working environment
 Salary + Stocks + Healthcare + Benefits + Vacation ++

If you are ready to become a key contributor and join one of todays hottest, market-leading companies, then email us your resume and salary reQuirements to Jobs@Brighterion.com
http://www.brighterion.com/

Brighterion is an Equal Employment Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer

To all recruitment agencies
Brighterion does not accept agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Brighterion employees or any other company location.
